item.title: Fears, daemons and survival
item.description: Yet again some disturbing news about planetary changes, chaos and catastrophe. IÂ´m kind of fed up of this. Supposedly this is a good sign for a change of pace, direction and consciousness. But once more, nothing happens, just more of the same, life goes on with its injustice, crime, non-tolerance and fear, despite the general will to live better lives. Is it just me or we are headed for worse things day after day?
